startGroup

  • startGroup(name: string, visibility??: Visibility, tags??: string[], sprite?: string): void

  • Start a new test group.

    Each group needs a name, which is user visible. You can also optionally provide the name of a sprite, which allows for a better display, for example by showing the sprite or linking to it. You must use the sprite's name.

    Parameters

    • name: string

      Name of the test group.

    • Optional visibility: Visibility = 'show'

      Default visibility of the group. If an error occurs, the group must always be shown.

    • Optional tags: string[] = []

      Optional tags for this group.

    • Optional sprite: string

      Name of optionally linked sprite.

    Returns void

    • Defined in packages/core/src/output/index.ts:122
